Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: It is a benign error message since those images are not used in v1.4.x. Unfortunately the same master bootstrap.sh script file is used for v1.4.x and v2.0, but we could use this Jira issue to suppress the pull when doing v1.4.x or at least include a message that the images are not needed for v1.4.x.
